items.romanization: nǐ jīntiān yǒu kòng ma

gloss.en: Are you free today

items.romanization: nǐ xǐ huān shén me yàng de yīn yuè

gloss.en: What kind of music do you like?

items.romanization: zhè ge cài yǒu diǎn là

gloss.en: This dish is a bit spicy.

items.romanization: wǒ měi tiān zǎo shàng liù diǎn qǐ chuáng

gloss.en: I get up at six o'clock every morning.

items.romanization: tā de jiā zài xué xiào fù jìn

gloss.en: Her house is near the school.

items.romanization: nǐ néng bāng wǒ yí ge máng ma

gloss.en: Can you do me a favor?

items.romanization: wǒ men xià zhōu yǒu yí ge huì yì

gloss.en: We have a meeting next week.

items.romanization: zhè cì lǚ xíng zhēn yǒu qù

gloss.en: This trip is really interesting.

items.text: 你对这个城市印象怎么样
items.romanization: nǐ duì zhè ge chéng shì yìn xiàng zěn me yàng

gloss.en: What is your impression of this city?

items.text: 他正在写一封电子邮件
items.romanization: tā zhèng zài xiě yì fēng diàn zǐ yóu jiàn

gloss.en: He is writing an email.

items.text: 请帮我把这本书放回去
items.romanization: qǐng bāng wǒ bǎ zhè běn shū fàng huí qù

gloss.en: Please help me put this book back.

items.text: 我们打算明年去中国旅游
items.romanization: wǒ men dǎ suàn míng nián qù zhōng guó lǚ yóu

gloss.en: We plan to travel to China next year.

items.text: 你喜欢看什么类型的电影
items.romanization: nǐ xǐ huān kàn shén me lèi xíng de diàn yǐng

gloss.en: What type of movies do you like to watch?

items.romanization: qǐng gěi wǒ yì bēi kā fēi

gloss.en: Please give me a cup of coffee.

items.text: 她今天穿了一件新衣服
items.romanization: tā jīn tiān chuān le yì jiàn xīn yī fú

gloss.en: She wore new clothes today.

items.romanization: nǐ qù guò nǎ xiē guó jiā

gloss.en: Which countries have you been to?

items.romanization: wǒ duì zhè fèn gōng zuò hěn mǎn yì

gloss.en: I am very satisfied with this job.

items.romanization: zhè jiā cān tīng de fú wù hěn hǎo

gloss.en: The service in this restaurant is very good.

items.text: 你能告诉我怎么去机场吗
items.romanization: nǐ néng gào sù wǒ zěn me qù jī chǎng ma

gloss.en: Can you tell me how to get to the airport?

items.romanization: wǒ xǐ huān zài zhōu mò qù pá shān

gloss.en: I like to go hiking on weekends.

items.romanization: qǐng wèn, xǐ shǒu jiān zài nǎ lǐ

gloss.en: Excuse me, where is the restroom?

items.romanization: nǐ zhōu mò yǒu shén me jì huà

gloss.en: What plans do you have for the weekend?

items.text: 我昨天跟朋友去看电影了
items.romanization: wǒ zuó tiān gēn péng yǒu qù kàn diàn yǐng le

gloss.en: Yesterday, I went to watch a movie with a friend.

items.romanization: qǐng bǎ zhè gè wén jiàn fā gěi wǒ

gloss.en: Please send this document to me.

items.romanization: nǐ xǐ huān hē kā fēi hái shì chá

gloss.en: Do you like to drink coffee or tea?

items.text: 这个包太贵了，可以便宜一点吗
items.romanization: zhè gè bāo tài guì le, kě yǐ pián yi yì diǎn ma

gloss.en: This bag is too expensive, can it be cheaper?

items.romanization: wǒ wǎn shàng bā diǎn dào jiā

gloss.en: I will be home at 8 PM.

items.text: 你能教我怎么做这个菜吗
items.romanization: nǐ néng jiāo wǒ zěn me zuò zhè gè cài ma

gloss.en: Can you teach me how to make this dish?

items.romanization: qù jī chǎng dà gài yào duō jiǔ

gloss.en: How long does it take to get to the airport?

items.romanization: wǒ de shǒu jī méi diàn le

gloss.en: My phone is out of battery.

items.romanization: nǐ huì shuō jǐ zhǒng yǔ yán

gloss.en: How many languages can you speak?

items.romanization: wǒ de fáng jiān zài sān lóu

gloss.en: My room is on the third floor.

items.text: 你能帮我打开这个瓶子吗
items.romanization: nǐ néng bāng wǒ dǎ kāi zhè gè píng zi ma

gloss.en: Can you help me open this bottle?

items.romanization: tā men zhèng zài kāi huì

gloss.en: They are having a meeting.

items.romanization: nǐ chī guò běi jīng kǎo yā ma

gloss.en: Have you ever eaten Peking duck?

items.romanization: jīn tiān de tiān qì zěn me yàng

gloss.en: How is the weather today?

items.text: 他正在准备明天的演讲
items.romanization: tā zhèng zài zhǔn bèi míng tiān de yǎn jiǎng

gloss.en: He is preparing for tomorrow's presentation.

items.romanization: nǐ kàn guò zhè běn shū ma

gloss.en: Have you read this book?

items.romanization: wǒ xiǎng yù dìng yí gè fáng jiān

gloss.en: I would like to book a room.

items.text: 你知道哪里可以找到好吃的
items.romanization: nǐ zhī dào nǎ lǐ kě yǐ zhǎo dào hǎo chī de

gloss.en: Do you know where I can find good food?

items.romanization: zhè gè dì fāng de fēng jǐng hěn měi

gloss.en: The scenery at this place is very beautiful.

items.romanization: nǐ zuìjìn zài máng shénme

gloss.en: What have you been busy with lately

items.romanization: nǐ zhōu mò xǐ huan zuò shén me

gloss.en: What do you like to do on weekends

items.romanization: wǒ yǐ jīng wán chéng le gōng zuò

gloss.en: I have already finished the work

items.romanization: nǐ xiǎng hē diǎn shén me

gloss.en: What would you like to drink

items.romanization: wǒ zhèng zài xué zhōng wén

gloss.en: I am learning Chinese

items.romanization: míng tiān de huì yì jǐ diǎn kāi shǐ

gloss.en: What time does tomorrow's meeting start

items.romanization: qǐng bāng wǒ ná yī xià nà běn shū

gloss.en: Please help me get that book

items.text: 春天是我最喜欢的季节
items.romanization: chūn tiān shì wǒ zuì xǐ huan de jì jié

gloss.en: Spring is my favorite season

items.text: 我们可以坐地铁去博物馆
items.romanization: wǒ men kě yǐ zuò dì tiě qù bó wù guǎn

gloss.en: We can take the subway to the museum

items.romanization: nǐ yǒu méi yǒu shí jiān bāng wǒ

gloss.en: Do you have time to help me

items.text: 昨天我去看了一场电影
items.romanization: zuó tiān wǒ qù kàn le yī chǎng diàn yǐng

gloss.en: Yesterday I went to see a movie

items.romanization: zhè jiā cān tīng de cài hěn hǎo chī

gloss.en: The food at this restaurant is delicious

items.romanization: wǒ dǎ suàn xià gè yuè qù lǚ xíng

gloss.en: I plan to travel next month

items.text: 你知道这个单词的意思吗
items.romanization: nǐ zhī dào zhè gè dān cí de yì si ma

gloss.en: Do you know the meaning of this word

items.romanization: jīn tiān de tiān qì zěn me yàng

gloss.en: How is the weather today

items.romanization: wǒ xiǎng yào yī bēi kā fēi

gloss.en: I would like a cup of coffee

items.romanization: tā shì wǒ de hǎo péng you

gloss.en: He is my good friend

items.text: 你能告诉我怎么去机场吗
items.romanization: nǐ néng gào sù wǒ zěn me qù jī chǎng ma

gloss.en: Can you tell me how to get to the airport

items.text: 这里有一个很好的书店
items.romanization: zhè lǐ yǒu yī gè hěn hǎo de shū diàn

gloss.en: There is a very good bookstore here

items.romanization: qǐng jǐn kuài huí fù wǒ de yóu jiàn

gloss.en: Please reply to my email as soon as possible

items.text: 你觉得这件衣服怎么样
items.romanization: nǐ jué de zhè jiàn yī fu zěn me yàng

gloss.en: What do you think of this clothing
